editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Acts of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus, Gädlä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus, ገድለ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ Paolo Marrassini, Vita Omelia Miracoli del Santo Gabra Manfas Qeddus, CSCO 597/598, EA 107/108 (Louvain: Peeters, 2003). F-98v: Acts of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus, arranged for the days of the week: [Monday (1r)], Tuesday (17r), Wednesday (33), Thusday (52r), Friday (65v), Saturday (82r). F-100v: Image of Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, Mälk‘a Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, መልክአ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡, Incipit: ሰላም: ለጽንሰትከ: መሠረተ: ነገር: ወውጣኔ: Répertoire 196. MG 553ff. F-135v: Eighteen Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus, arranged for the days of the week: Tuesday (108v), Wednesday (114r), Thursday (119v), Friday (124r), Saturday (128v), Sunday (132). : Instructions for and importance of reading the Gädlä Gäbrä Mänfäs Qəddus. Notes: mentions the owner, ወልደ ኢጊዮርጊስ (sic), and his mother, አዋልደ ንግሥት, and the scribe, አርከ ሥሉስ. F: pen trials.

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
